channel.title: Project 16 v4.5 Help -1500K to person who answers all!-
channel.description:
Hi, I'm giving away 1500K RSGP to anyone who can help fix these things in Prject 16 v4.5.
-Banning - IP Banning -Muting -Adding Drops(Looked through TuT's, and didn't fnd anything that works for P16 v4.5) -Adding a basic woodcutting.
So, if anyone can tell me how to fix/make all those, they will get 1500K RSGP, and maybe a free level 49.
Stats-
40 attack 40 strength 40 defence 50 range 53 mage I fogot hp.
Thanks in advance. I will check post tommorow, (If I get any replies... :\ )

item.title: Project 16 v4.5 Help -1500K to person who answers all!-
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

-Banning - Buffered reader / writer
-Muting - ^

-Adding Drops - if(npcs[i].npcType == ####) { ItemHandler.addItem(itemID, npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY, Amount, GetNpcKiller(i), false); }

-Adding a basic woodcutting - find tree case make it add wood and do an animation

ex.

case ####: if(playerHasItem(axeID) && playerLevel[#] >= required) { startAnimation(ID); addItem(woodID, 1); } else { sendMessage("You cannot cut this tree"); } break;

Read full topic
item.source: Project 16 v4.5 Help -1500K to person who answers all!-

And I think that there is woodcutting, it is just disabled, re-make the packets to where they actually add instead of that [1] = 100; crap.

Read full topic
